marklogic.body:
If there is no rational basis to call abortion murder why did the NARAL group suppress ALL evidence that life begins at conception in order to get Abortion legalised? Why did they lie about statistics and invent non-existent Polls to show that most people agreed with abortion - when they knew theÂ opposite was true?
Foetologists [who are NOT abortionists] will tell you that life begins at conception. And they should know!
So, my friend, when you think that a baby in the womb has it's arms and legs cut while it's still alive' or is covered with saline solution which Burns it's skin Off - while it's still alive, I hope you're STILL able to twitter on about it NOT being murder.
Abortion is FAR from being a bl##dy fairytale. It's a holocaust. YOUR total in USA is 53 MILLION and counting. No wonder your country is disintegrating!
